The claims made by Twitter users: kapilverma73 and @AshishJaggi_1, who stated that Muslims started the brawl after the installation of Ganesh's idol.
The location mentioned in the posts: specifically Lal Darwaja locality in Hyderabad, where the incident allegedly took place.
The debunking of the claim by The News M: TNM), which published a report stating that the incident was not sparked by communal tensions but was a result of a personal dispute.
